h1_title: Things Black Myth Wukong Doesn't Tell You
content: Finally, it's important to note that all the Keeper's Shrines in a chapter share the same wares in the Store menu, but the offerings will differ in the next chapter, so always stock up before heading to the next big area. The only exception are marked "Secret Areas" you can unlock in a chapter -- find a Shrine in these places and check their shop for items you won't find elsewhere!

The content is as follows:
Finally, it's important to note that all the Keeper's Shrines in a chapter share the same wares in the Store menu, but the offerings will differ in the next chapter, so always stock up before heading to the next big area. The only exception are marked "Secret Areas" you can unlock in a chapter -- find a Shrine in these places and check their shop for items you won't find elsewhere!
